| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsgsum.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |

| 8 |  | pwsgsum.w | |- ( ph -> ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` R ) = ( Scalar ` R ) |

| 18 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> R e. CMnd ) |

| 21 | 8, 20 | #P_breqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) finSupp ( 0g ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |

| 23 | 12, 22 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( Y gsum ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( R gsum ( y e. J |-> U ) ) ) ) |
